turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm wanting to get an order delivered for Starbucks coffee, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Let me see what I can do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like I can order something for you for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am thinking a Cinnamon Shortbread Frappuccino would sounds delicious.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size were you thinking of?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get that with heavy cream possibly?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Heavy cream, unfortunately is not an option for this Peverage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What other options do I have available for it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you looking for milk options?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I'm looking for whipped cream or sprinkles or topping options.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can add whip cream as well as.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think I'll stick with the normal Whipped Cream with the Cinnamon and Nutmeg Sprinkle sprinkling on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me get this all started for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One Venti Cinnamon Shortbread Latte, with Almond milk and Whip cream as well as Crumbles and Cinnamon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you confirm that that's a Frappuccino, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, this comes in iced, as well as Frappuccino.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent. And did you order Would you please order the Frappuccino for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One Venti Cinnamon Shortbread Latte Frappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And will this be picked up at California street in SF?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, thanks so much for confirming.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The drink will be ready within 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the receipt will be sent to you mobile device.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is. Thank you very much.
